titles.title: Mine Eyes Have Seen the Glory (Julia Ward Howe)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory, glory halleluia! Glory, glory, Hallelulia! Glory, glory, hallelulia! His truth is Marching on.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never Call retreat’ He is sifting out the hearts of men before His Judgment seat; O be swift, my soul, to answer Him! Be jubilant, My feet! Our God is marching on.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the beauty of the lilies, Christ was born across The sea, With a glory in His bosom that transfigures you And me, As He died to make men holy, let us die to make Men free, While God is marching on.{/lang-eng}
